title: present perfect continuous vs persent perfect?

replies.msg: 其實有咩情況下可以用是但一隻？咩情況一定要用某一隻？

兩者好似 只是當你想講
係一段過去做左又仍然做緊的長長長時間就用 present perfect continuous

quote.msg:
兩者好似 只是當你想講
係一段過去做左又仍然做緊的長長長時間就用 present perfect continuous

replies.msg:
如果我講做緊一樣嘢，唔強調做完未，咁係咪用是但兩個都可以？
例如:
I have watched Pornhub for 3 hours.
I have been watching Pornhub for 3 hours.


如果關係到依家嘅嘢就係用present perfect.

例如:
I have watched Pornhub for 3 hours, so I am jerking off.
I have been watching Pornhub for 3 hours. I have got no time to do the housework.
